checks.title: Admin review produces Reviewed outcome and (if approved) activation gates access
checks.details: Admin review queue loaded but no review link became visible (list empty or fetch failed)

notes: Non-blocking v1 audit; FAIL indicates gaps; NOT_BUILT indicates missing surfaces.
